title.narrative: Leadership and management training for leaders and agricultural extension to members

description.narrative:
null
SOUP is recently accepted prospect of AGriterra. Thsi proposla focusses on building the capacity of the current municipal association leaders focussing on strategic planning; how to make a workplan; and European Integration. With improved knowldege on these topics it is expected that the municipal associations will improve their work and they will have better access to various information and access to funds of potential partners.For the members, mostly being mixed or dairy farmers, different extension brochures will be prepared. The following topics are included: 1. How to improve the quality of milk (in line with new regulations about raw milk) and quantity of milk per animal in a cost effective manner 2. Financial bookeeping at the farm level. For this pupose , 6 farms will serve as a practical example.
• An overview of prospects/leads for investments in Uganda livestock sector. • A list of Dutch companies potentially interested to invest in the Uganda livestock sector, including an overview of subsidy instruments.

participating-org.narrative: Union of Municipal Associations of Agricultural Producers USC

description.narrative: OSID / FO has well-managed, competent human resources and essential structures and facilities (‘professionalism’)

comment.narrative: # + number at title refers to internal id
